In 2 weeks when I finally look at it
Because Raine's hair is practically its own organism.
I abentmindedly started doodling in a copybook a few days ago, and then realised that I had drawn a silhouette that looked rather like Raine.
All the better for future fanarts of her and Kessah as Spartans of Fireteam Luna, I suppose...

But yeah, I won't be looking at any of these sketches for a bit, because whenever I reread the comic, I find it best to switch off it for a two-week period beforehand. Makes the jump back in more magical.
And I think this weekend I'll start drawing a fantasy map-I've realised I need a setting for my OCs.
Oh, I just noticed that the latest Nvidia driver changelog says it fixes artifacts in Adobe products. v419.67, released... today.

Oh man, I had my pc case open on my bed being worked on, and I turned around and see my cat eyeing it like she wants to jump in.
Case looks like a box - best place for cats.
Probably at that moment she was thinking "Stupid people. This is a great box, why do they put stupid electronic things inside this box?"
Interesting. New computer will affect the speed of work on Nora cards?
Well, it is warm in there.
One of the more subtle jokes in orig portal was that Rattmann used random pcs as hotplates dodging GLaDOS for survival.
There were just open cases in the office areas with pots in place of the heatsinks. XD
The Pentium 4 era was deservingly barbaric.
Dang, hit my wall in Sekiro: SDT. Genichiro Ashina. Fought the guy a good 5 or 6 times, still can't beat him. I can get close, but I'm just way too greedy. Feelsbadman.
